block.p: BASEBALL American League ANAHEIM ANGELS - Sent LHP Juan Alvarez and OF Jeff DaVanon outright to Salt Lake of the PCL CLEVELAND INDIANS - Sent RHP Chris Nichting and INF-OF Chan Perry outright to Buffalo of the International League. National League COLORADO ROCKIES - Activated RF Larry Walker, RHP John Thomson and LHP Josh Kalinowski from the 6-day disabled list. LOS ANGELES DODGERS - Fired Davey Johnson, manager Northern League SCHAUMBURG FLYERS - Sold the contract of LHP Sean Lawrence to the San Diego Padres.

BASKETBALL National Basketball Association LOS ANGELES LAKERS - Signed G Brian Shaw to a two-year contract. Named Eugenis Chow as director of community relations. NEW JERSEY NETS - Named Travis Hyland video coordinator.

HOCKEY National Hockey League BUFFALO SABRES - Placed G Dominik Hasek on the injured reserve. Acquired G Peter Skudra off waivers from Boston. CALGARY FLAMES - Signed D Micki Dupont. LOS ANGELES KINGS - Activated F Ziggy Palffy from injured reserve. Assigned F Brad Chartrand to Lowell of the AHL. NEW YORK RANGERS - Re-assigned LW Johan Witehall to Hartford of the AHL. SAN JOSE SHARKS - Re-signed G Steve Shields and RW Todd Harvey. TAMPA BAY LIGHTNING - Reassigned D Marek Posmyk to Detroit of the IHL. Activated D Bryan Muir, D Paul Mara, D Andrei Syuzin and D Petr Svodboda from injured reserve. American Hockey League CINCINNATI MIGHTY DUCKS - Announced the Detroit Red Wings have reassigned D Ryan Gaucher to Toledo of the EHCL. HAMILTON BULLDOGS - Acquired LW Patrick Cote on loan fro the Edmonton Oilers. Sent D Kurtis Drummond on loan to Tallahassee of the EHCL. Signed LW jared Smyth and sent him on loan to Tallahassee. HARTFORD WOLF PACK - Acquired LW Johan Witehall on loan from the New York Rangers. LOUISVILLE PANTHERS - Sent RW Tim Findlay, LW Ryan Pawluk and RW Ian Jacobs on loan to Port Huron of the UHL and LW Olaf Kjenstad and LW Tyler Prosofsky on loan to Asheville of the UHL. NORFOLK ADMIRALS - Sent G Erasmo Saltarelli on loan to Greensboro of the ECHL. PROVIDENCE BRUINS - Announced G Peter Skidra has been recalled by the Boston Bruins. QUIEBEC CITADELLES - Acquired G Jose Thoedore and D Juha Lind on loan from the Montreal Canadiens. International Hockey League CHICAGO WOLVES - Announced the Islanders have assigned C Robert Petrovicky to the team.

COLLEGE COASTAL CAROLINA - Named Warren D. Koegel athletic director, effecitve Jan. 1. INDIANA - Announced junior F Tom Geyer has quit the men's basketball team. KEUKA - Named George F. Wunder men's basketball coach. VALPARAISO - Announced the resignation of Jay Spoonhour, men's assistant basketball coach, to become men's basketball coach at Wabash Valley. WASHINGTON & JEFFERSON - Announced the retirement of John Luckhardt, athletic director. Named associate athletic director Dick Soudan interim athletic director.
